remarks: Elementhood in the base set of the loop space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jul-2015.)
statement:
om1bas.o $e |- O = ( J Om1 Y ) $.
om1bas.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
om1bas.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. X ) $.
om1bas.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` O ) ) $.
om1elbas $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. B <-> ( F e. ( II Cn J ) /\ ( F ` 0 ) = Y /\ ( F ` 1 ) = Y ) ) ) $.
